name: Angry Mother -fast and furious guy
description:
When you watch adult videos in your room, mom suddenly comes in.

How quickly do you turn off videos? Angry Mother is a agility, geeky, humorous, and fast mouse click game based on all the boys experience.

FEATURES

- Close windows before mom comes into the room.

- Customize 8 rooms theme by earning coins.

- Use just 2 buttons, The red is to close window & The green is to minimize

- Avoid mother's attack!

- Share your high score in the Game Center Leaderboard

STORY

Most boys love watching adult videos when they are at home alone.

But suddenly mom is coming?!

Jacob must turn off all videos quickly before mom comes into the room!

OMG!! CRAZY WINDOWS ERROR!!

Your screen start going crazy!

After a minute... Mom comes into the room..

Don't panic! the hand is quicker than the eye.

From now you must be a super fast mouse clicker!

If not, you will soon see that mother's fury.

FOLLOW US

http://twitter.com/angrymother2015 (@angrymother2015)
